Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Sheridan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Sheridan.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
